Title: Establishes an energy system tax stabilization reserve fund in the Lansing Central School District to lessen or prevent increases in the school district's real property tax levy
Summary: Establishes an energy system tax stabilization reserve fund in the Lansing Central School District to lessen or prevent increases in the school district's real property tax levy resulting from decreases in revenue due to changes in or termination of the payments in lieu of taxes receivable by the school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish an energy system tax stabilization reserve fund in the Lansing Central School District to lessen or prevent increases in the school district's real property tax levy
